title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. N, pt. 187 - Inspection And Copying Of Department Records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. N, pt. 187 - Inspection And Copying Of Department Records

State Regulations
§ 187.1 - Designation of department officers
§ 187.2 - Submission of requests for inspection or copies of records
§ 187.3 - Times when records are available
§ 187.4 - Freedom of information law procedures
§ 187.5 - Personal privacy protection law procedures
§ 187.6 - Appeals
§ 187.7 - Fees
§ 187.8 - Protection of trade secrets and records maintained for the regulation of commercial enterprise
§ 187.9 - Retention of records

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. N, pt. 187

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§207, 305; Public

Officers Law, §§ 87, 89[3], 94, art. 6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
